name: ECONOMIC RECOVERY SUPPORT PROGRAM-SUBPROGRAM 2
info: Subprogram 2 will build on subprogram 1, which facilitated infrastructure investment in a period of constrained revenue, leveraged improvement in priority-setting processes for infrastructure investments, strengthened aspects of public financial management (PFM), and raised the policy profile of vulnerability issues. Subprogram 2 will further support government budget priorities, and will promote public sector reforms and measures that will help protect the vulnerable and safeguard the fiscal position of the Cook Islands to promote higher and more inclusive economic growth.
